mapelements

类 Country

  • java.lang.Object
    • mapelements.Country

  • public class Country
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the class for defining country.

    This class contains all information of a country.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Country(java.lang.String countryName, Continent continent)
      Constructor of Country class.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      int getArmyNumber()
      Method to get the army number on this country.
      Continent getBelongTo()
      Method to get continent which contains this country.
      int[] getCoordinate()
      Method to get country's coordinate.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Method to get country's name.
      Player getOwner()
      Method to get country's owner.
      boolean isFlagDFS()
      Method to get country's DFS Flag, used in DFS algorithm to indicate if this node has been visited.
      void setArmyNumber(int armyNumber)
      Method to change the army number on this country, is used in all phases of a game.
      void setBelongTo(Continent belongTo)
      Method to initialize or change the continent which contains this country, is used when creating a new country or moving one country to another continent.
      void setCoordinate(int coordinateX, int coordinateY)
      Method to initialize or change country's coordinate on a map, is used mainly when loading map from a map file.
      void setFlagDFS(boolean flagDFS)
      Method to change the DFS Flag, used in DFS algorithm to construct a DFS tree
      void setName(java.lang.String countryName)
      Method to initialize or change country's name, is used when creating a new country or changing an existing country's name.
      void setOwner(Player owner)
      Method to set country's owner, is used at the beginning of a game or during an attack phase.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Country

        public Country(java.lang.String countryName,
               Continent continent)
        Constructor of Country class.
        参数:
        countryName - name of the new country
        continent - continent object which contains this country

    • 方法详细资料

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Method to get country's name.
        返回:
        country's Name

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String countryName)
        Method to initialize or change country's name, is used when creating a new country or changing an existing country's name.
        参数:
        countryName - country's new name

      • getBelongTo

        public Continent getBelongTo()
        Method to get continent which contains this country.
        返回:
        continent object which contains this country

      • setBelongTo

        public void setBelongTo(Continent belongTo)
        Method to initialize or change the continent which contains this country, is used when creating a new country or moving one country to another continent.
        参数:
        belongTo - continent object to contain the country

      • getOwner

        public Player getOwner()
        Method to get country's owner.
        返回:
        country's current owner

      • setOwner

        public void setOwner(Player owner)
        Method to set country's owner, is used at the beginning of a game or during an attack phase.
        参数:
        owner - country's new owner

      • getCoordinate

        public int[] getCoordinate()
        Method to get country's coordinate.
        返回:
        country's coordinate in a array of integer

      • setCoordinate

        public void setCoordinate(int coordinateX,
                          int coordinateY)
        Method to initialize or change country's coordinate on a map, is used mainly when loading map from a map file.
        参数:
        coordinateX - coordinate X
        coordinateY - coordinate Y

      • isFlagDFS

        public boolean isFlagDFS()
        Method to get country's DFS Flag, used in DFS algorithm to indicate if this node has been visited.
        返回:
        country's DFS Flag

      • setFlagDFS

        public void setFlagDFS(boolean flagDFS)
        Method to change the DFS Flag, used in DFS algorithm to construct a DFS tree
        参数:
        flagDFS - DFS Flag

      • getArmyNumber

        public int getArmyNumber()
        Method to get the army number on this country.
        返回:
        army number on this country

      • setArmyNumber

        public void setArmyNumber(int armyNumber)
        Method to change the army number on this country, is used in all phases of a game.
        参数:
        armyNumber - number of armies
